reviewText: Love these movies so having them all in one collection like this is a great value especially considering we can access them with any service that uses our Ultraviolet account.

The Digital HD copies are UltraViolet copies and cannot be added to your Amazon Video Library. I am otherwise happy with this purchase, but bought it specifically for the digital copies that, in the past, I was always able to add to my Amazon account. You get a separate BluRay disc for each movie stored in one case.
Great price and amazing collection to own.
